task.title: How to save money doing laundry at home
task.shortdesc: Learn budget-friendly laundry tips to save money on water, energy, and detergent while ensuring your clothes are clean and well-maintained.

taskbody.context: As a student, laundry expenses can add up quickly. Here are some practical tips to save money while making the most of your resources.

substep.cmd: Only wash full loads of laundry to save water, detergent, and energy.
Use cold water to save energy and help prevent colors from fading.
Use concentrated detergents that require less per wash to save money over time.
Air dry clothes on hangers or racks to save energy and make your clothes last longer.
Fabric softeners are an additional and unecessary cost.
Run an empty cycle with vinegar once a month to remove buildup.
Clean machines operatre more efficiently, cleaning clothes in less time.
